name: Old Dominion Freight Line, Inc.
description: Old Dominion Freight Line, Inc. is a leading provider of regional, interregional, and national less-than-truckload (LTL) services. Founded in 1934 and headquartered in Thomasville, North Carolina, ODFL has built a reputation for its commitment to quality service and operational excellence. The company operates a fleet of more than 10,000 trucks and services a network of over 250 service centers across the United States. Old Dominion focuses on providing reliable and efficient freight transportation, leveraging advanced technology and a dedicated workforce to meet the needs of its customers. The company is recognized for its strong financial performance and has consistently been ranked among the best in its industry for service excellence and customer satisfaction. ODFL offers a variety of services, including time-sensitive deliveries and specialized handling for various types of freight. With a commitment to safety and sustainability, Old Dominion continues to innovate and expand its logistics solutions, positioning itself as a key player in the freight transportation sector. The company aims to provide the highest level of service to its customers while maintaining a strong focus on operational efficiency and cost management.
